00063 GSList *
00064 collect_nvts (const char *folder, const char *subdir, GSList * files)
00065 {
00066   GDir *dir;
00067   const gchar *fname;
00068 
00069   if (folder == NULL)
00070     return files;
00071 
00072   dir = g_dir_open (folder, 0, NULL);
00073   if (dir == NULL)
00074     return files;
00075 
00076   fname = g_dir_read_name (dir);
00077   while (fname)
00078     {
00079       char *path;
00080 
00081       path = g_build_filename (folder, fname, NULL);
00082       if (g_file_test (path, G_FILE_TEST_IS_DIR))
00083         {
00084           char *new_folder, *new_subdir;
00085 
00086           new_folder = g_build_filename (folder, fname, NULL);
00087           new_subdir = g_build_filename (subdir, fname, NULL);
00088 
00089           files = collect_nvts (new_folder, new_subdir, files);
00090 
00091           if (new_folder)
00092             g_free (new_folder);
00093           if (new_subdir)
00094             g_free (new_subdir);
00095         }
00096       else if (g_str_has_suffix (fname, ".nasl"))
00097         files = g_slist_prepend (files,
00098                                  g_build_filename (subdir, fname, NULL));
00099       g_free (path);
00100       fname = g_dir_read_name (dir);
00101     }
00102 
00103   g_dir_close (dir);
00104   return files;
00105 }
00106 
00107 int
00108 calculate_eta (struct timeval start_time, int loaded, int total)
00109 {
00110   struct timeval current_time;
00111   int elapsed, remaining;
00112 
00113   if (start_time.tv_sec == 0)
00114     return 0;
00115 
00116   gettimeofday (&current_time, NULL);
00117   elapsed = current_time.tv_sec - start_time.tv_sec;
00118   remaining = total - loaded;
00119   return (remaining * elapsed) / loaded;
00120 }
00121 
00122 static int *loading_shm = NULL;
00123 static int loading_shmid = 0;
00124 
00125 /*
00126  * @brief Initializes the shared memory data used to report plugins loading
00127  *        progress to other processes.
00128  */
00129 void
00130 init_loading_shm ()
00131 {
00132   int shm_key;
00133 
00134   if (loading_shm)
00135     return;
00136 
00137   shm_key = rand () + 1;
00138   /*
00139    * Create shared memory segment if it doesn't exist.
00140    * This will be used to communicate current plugins loading progress to other
00141    * processes.
00142    * loading_shm[0]: Number of loaded plugins.
00143    * loading_shm[1]: Total number of plugins.
00144    */
00145   loading_shmid = shmget (shm_key, sizeof (int) * 2, IPC_CREAT | 0600);
00146   if (loading_shmid < 0)
00147     perror ("shmget");
00148   loading_shm = shmat (loading_shmid, NULL, 0);
00149   if (loading_shm == (void *) -1)
00150     {
00151       perror ("shmat");
00152       loading_shm = NULL;
00153     }
00154   else
00155     bzero (loading_shm, sizeof (int) * 2);
00156 }
00157 
00158 /*
00159  * @brief Destroys the shared memory data used to report plugins loading
00160  *        progress to other processes.
00161  */
00162 void
00163 destroy_loading_shm ()
00164 {
00165   if (loading_shm)
00166     {
00167       shmdt (loading_shm);
00168       if (shmctl (loading_shmid, IPC_RMID, NULL))
00169         perror ("shmctl");
00170       loading_shm = NULL;
00171       loading_shmid = 0;
00172     }
00173 }
00174 
00175 /*
00176  * @brief Gives current number of loaded plugins.
00177  *
00178  * @return Number of loaded plugins,  0 if initalization wasn't successful.
00179  */
00180 int
00181 current_loading_plugins ()
00182 {
00183   return loading_shm ? loading_shm[0] : 0;
00184 }
00185 
00186 /*
00187  * @brief Gives the total number of plugins to be loaded.
00188  *
00189  * @return Total of loaded plugins,  0 if initalization wasn't successful.
00190  */
00191 int
00192 total_loading_plugins ()
00193 {
00194   return loading_shm ? loading_shm[1] : 0;
00195 }
00196 
00197 /*
00198  * @brief Sets number of loaded plugins.
00199  *
00200  * @param[in]   current Number of loaded plugins.
00201  */
00202 void
00203 set_current_loading_plugins (int current)
00204 {
00205   if (loading_shm)
00206     loading_shm[0] = current;
00207 }
00208 
00209 /*
00210  * @brief Sets total number of plugins to be loaded.
00211  *
00212  * @param[in]   total Total number of plugins
00213  */
00214 void
00215 set_total_loading_plugins (int total)
00216 {
00217   if (loading_shm)
00218     loading_shm[1] = total;
00219 }
00220 
00221 static struct arglist *
00222 plugins_reload_from_dir (struct arglist *preferences, struct arglist *plugins,
00223                          char *folder)
00224 {
00225   GSList *files = NULL, *f;
00226   gchar *pref_include_folders;
00227   int loaded_files = 0, num_files = 0;
00228   struct timeval start_time;
00229 
00230   add_nasl_inc_dir ("");        // for absolute and relative paths
00231 
00232   pref_include_folders = arg_get_value (preferences, "include_folders");
00233   if (pref_include_folders != NULL)
00234     {
00235       gchar **include_folders = g_strsplit (pref_include_folders, ":", 0);
00236       int i = 0;
00237 
00238       for (i = 0; i < g_strv_length (include_folders); i++)
00239         {
00240           int result = add_nasl_inc_dir (include_folders[i]);
00241           if (result < 0)
00242             printf ("Could not add %s to the list of include folders.\n"
00243                     "Make sure %s exists and is a directory.\n",
00244                     include_folders[i], include_folders[i]);
00245         }
00246 
00247       g_strfreev (include_folders);
00248     }
00249 
00250   if (folder == NULL)
00251     {
00252 #ifdef DEBUG
00253       log_write ("%s:%d : folder == NULL\n", __FILE__, __LINE__);
00254 #endif
00255       printf ("Could not determine the value of <plugins_folder>. Check %s\n",
00256               (char *) arg_get_value (preferences, "config_file"));
00257       return plugins;
00258     }
00259 
00260   files = collect_nvts (folder, "", files);
00261   num_files = g_slist_length (files);
00262 
00263   /*
00264    * Add the plugins
00265    */
00266 
00267   if (gettimeofday (&start_time, NULL))
00268     {
00269       bzero (&start_time, sizeof (start_time));
00270       log_write ("gettimeofday: %s\n", strerror (errno));
00271     }
00272   f = files;
00273   set_total_loading_plugins (num_files);
00274   while (f != NULL)
00275     {
00276       char *name = f->data;
00277       loaded_files++;
00278       if (loaded_files % 50 == 0)
00279         {
00280           int percentile, eta;
00281 
00282           set_current_loading_plugins (loaded_files);
00283           percentile = (loaded_files * 100) / num_files;
00284           eta = calculate_eta (start_time, loaded_files, num_files);
00285           proctitle_set ("openvassd: Reloaded %d of %d NVTs"
00286                          " (%d%% / ETA: %02d:%02d)", loaded_files, num_files,
00287                          percentile, eta / 60, eta % 60);
00288         }
00289       if (preferences_log_plugins_at_load (preferences))
00290         log_write ("Loading %s\n", name);
00291       if (g_str_has_suffix (name, ".nasl"))
00292         nasl_plugin_add (folder, name, plugins, preferences);
00293       g_free (f->data);
00294       f = g_slist_next (f);
00295     }
00296 
00297   g_slist_free (files);
00298 
00299   proctitle_set ("openvassd: Reloaded all the NVTs.");
00300 
00301   return plugins;
00302 }
00303 
00304 /*
00305  * main function for loading all the
00306  * plugins that are in folder <folder>
00307  */
00308 struct arglist *
00309 plugins_init (struct arglist *preferences)
00310 {
00311   nvticache_t * nvti_cache;
00312   char *plugins_folder;
00313   struct arglist *plugins;
00314 
00315   // @todo: Perhaps check wether "nvticache" is already present in arglist
00316   plugins_folder = arg_get_value (preferences, "plugins_folder");
00317   nvti_cache = nvticache_new (arg_get_value (preferences, "cache_folder"),
00318                               plugins_folder);
00319   arg_add_value (preferences, "nvticache", ARG_PTR, -1, nvti_cache);
00320   plugins = emalloc (sizeof (struct arglist));
00321 
00322   return plugins_reload_from_dir (preferences, plugins, plugins_folder);
00323 }
00324 
00325 void
00326 plugin_set_socket (struct arglist *plugin, int soc)
00327 {
00328   if (arg_get_value (plugin, "SOCKET") != NULL)
00329     arg_set_value (plugin, "SOCKET", sizeof (gpointer), GSIZE_TO_POINTER (soc));
00330   else
00331     arg_add_value (plugin, "SOCKET", ARG_INT, sizeof (gpointer),
00332                    GSIZE_TO_POINTER (soc));
00333 }
00334 
00335 int
00336 plugin_get_socket (struct arglist *plugin)
00337 {
00338   return GPOINTER_TO_SIZE (arg_get_value (plugin, "SOCKET"));
00339 }
00340 
00341 
00342 void
00343 plugin_unlink (plugin)
00344      struct arglist *plugin;
00345 {
00346   if (plugin == NULL)
00347     {
00348       fprintf (stderr, "Error in plugin_unlink - args == NULL\n");
00349       return;
00350     }
00351   arg_set_value (plugin, "preferences", -1, NULL);
00352 }
00353 
00354 
00355 void
00356 plugin_free (plugin)
00357      struct arglist *plugin;
00358 {
00359   plugin_unlink (plugin);
00360   arg_free_all (plugin);
00361 }
00362 
00363 void
00364 plugins_free (plugins)
00365      struct arglist *plugins;
00366 {
00367   struct arglist *p = plugins;
00368   if (p == NULL)
00369     return;
00370 
00371   while (p->next)
00372     {
00373       plugin_unlink (p->value);
00374       p = p->next;
00375     }
00376   arg_free_all (plugins);
00377 }
00378 
00379 /*
00380  * Put our socket somewhere in the plugins
00381  * arguments
00382  */
00383 void
00384 plugins_set_socket (struct arglist *plugins, int soc)
00385 {
00386   struct arglist *t;
00387 
00388   t = plugins;
00389   while (t && t->next)
00390     {
00391       plugin_set_socket (t->value, soc);
00392       t = t->next;
00393     }
00394 }
